notes: mass noun; often uncountable; plural used for loaves/types

example_sentence_english: I would like a loaf of bread, please.

notes: plural used for loaves or types
example_sentence_english: I bought two loaves of bread.
The loaves are on the table.

notes: partitive; less common than partitive with mass noun

example_sentence_english: The taste of the bread is good.

example_sentence_english: I took some slices from the loaves.
